discussion_comments.comment_body: do we need to add this? I'm not seeing this in others.

Yes, all decoupled data sources have to have this. See for example [mysql](https://github.com/grafana/grafana/blob/main/public/app/plugins/datasource/mysql/plugin.json#L5) or [tempo](https://github.com/grafana/grafana/blob/main/public/app/plugins/datasource/tempo/plugin.json#L6). It should be in every decoupled plugin - I noticed we don't do it in zipkin/jaeger - probably because we added backand afterwards. Will create fix for them.
might want to exclude `azuremonitor` from the key generation, as its taken from parsing out the `app/plugins/datasource/{foo}` path

```suggestion
      "description": "Deprecated. Update your plugin by running `npx @grafana/create-plugin@latest update` to update the format of your generated `plugin.json` file.",
```
